fuzz.command.use_help: Click the corresponding value to configure, or use the command /fuzz <function> <option> to set
fuzz.keyBinding.quickKickFakePlayer.name: quickKickFakePlayer
fuzz.command.highlightEntity.cleared: <Fuzz> All highlighted entities have been cleared
fuzz.command.highlightEntity.list_is_emp: <Fuzz> There are currently no highlighted entities
Disable the slow effect when using items
fuzz.settings.sneakingSlowDownDisabled.d: Disable the slow effect while sneaking
fuzz.settings.hurtShakeDisabled.name: hurtShakeDisabled
fuzz.settings.hurtShakeDisabled.desc: Disable the jitter of the first-person view when the player is injured
fuzz.settings.renderHandDisabled.name: renderHandDisabled
fuzz.settings.renderHandDisabled.desc: Disable the rendering of the arm
fuzz.settings.bedRockFlying.name: bedRockFlying
fuzz.settings.bedRockFlying.desc: Removed the drift effect while flying, just like Bedrock Edition
fuzz.settings.blockOutlineColor.name: blockOutlineColor
fuzz.settings.blockOutlineColor.desc: Modify the color of the block outline
fuzz.settings.blockOutlineAlpha.name: blockOutlineAlpha
fuzz.settings.blockOutlineAlpha.desc: Modify the alpha of the block outline
fuzz.settings.blockOutlineWidth.name: blockOutlineWidth
fuzz.settings.blockOutlineWidth.desc: Modify the line width of the block outline
fuzz.settings.skyColor.name: skyColor
fuzz.settings.skyColor.desc: Modify the color of the sky
fuzz.settings.fogColor.name: fogColor
fuzz.settings.fogColor.desc: Modify the color of the fog
fuzz.settings.waterColor.name: waterColor
fuzz.settings.waterColor.desc: Modify the color of the water
fuzz.settings.waterFogColor.name: waterFogColor
fuzz.settings.waterFogColor.desc: Modify the color of the water fog
fuzz.settings.quickKickFakePlayer.name: quickKickFakePlayer
fuzz.settings.quickKickFakePlayer.desc: Use the hotkeys to kick out the fake player pointed to by the crosshair
Specify hotkeys in the game settings
fuzz.settings.quickDropFakePlayerAllItem: Use hotkeys to throw out all item stacks of the fake player pointed by the crosshair
Specify hotkeys in the game settings
fuzz.settings.letFluidInteractLikeAir.de: Let the player interact with the fluid like air
fuzz.settings.fluidPushDisabled.name: fluidPushDisabled
fuzz.settings.slimeBlockSlowDownDisabled: Prevents the player from slowing and bouncing from slime blocks
fuzz.settings.cobwebSlowDownDisabled.des: Prevents the player from being slowed by cobwebs
fuzz.settings.iceSlipperinessDisabled.de: Prevents the player from slipping from ice blocks
fuzz.settings.soulSandBlockSlowDownDisab: Prevents the player from slowing from soul sands
fuzz.settings.honeyBlockSlowDownDisabled: Prevents the player from slowing and jumping falloff from honey blocks
fuzz.settings.bubbleColumnInteractDisabl: Prevents the player from being affected by the bubble column
fuzz.settings.pickFluidBucketItemInCreat: In Creative mode, you can target a fluid and use the middle mouse button to pick up the corresponding bucket
fuzz.settings.commandHighLightEntities.d: Use command to highlight one or more specified entities
fuzz.settings.commandHighLightEntities.e: Use /highlightEntity help command to view the user guide
